2026-02-22-1a-tree-renderer.md.description: tree-mode rendering branch in Sidebar.String() with indentation, chevrons, and status glyphs

2026-02-22-1b-tree-navigation.md.description: Left/Right tree-traversal methods and Space/Enter/arrow keybindings for tree-mode sidebar

2026-02-22-1c-highlight-boost-list.md.description: highlight-boost instance list with partition sort and dimmed rendering for non-matching instances

2026-02-22-2-tree-mode-wiring.md.description: wire tree renderer, navigation, and highlight-boost together; remove DisableTreeMode gate

2026-02-22-center-col-v-align.md.description: center column is scrolled up slightly and also not bottom aligned

2026-02-22-customize-superpowers.md.description: streamline interactions with superpowers and this app by personalizing the superpowers skills

2026-02-22-detect-permissions-needed.md.description: indicate in list view if permissions are needed and switch to live capture (or increased cache r/w if possible) to button presses dont jump back and forth

2026-02-22-disable-cache-focused.md.description: disable cache reading and poll tmux pane directly when focused to improve interactive experience (it glitches a lot currently)

2026-02-22-dupe-task-after-plan-change.m.description: i marked another plan done and suddenly i had 2 of another one that was running even though it hasn't switched to a review agent yet

2026-02-22-kq-check.md.description: kq check command to audit skills sync health across all three layers (global, project, superpowers)

2026-02-22-parallelize-superpowers.md.description: extract any parallelization opportunities by controlling individual task fixes (use new agent for each even if sequential)

2026-02-22-planner-exit-prompt.md.description: show confirmation dialog when planner finishes asking whether to start implementation

2026-02-22-rename-to-kasmos.md.description: switch name back to kasmos and overtake that repo (rename that one to kasmold first)

2026-02-22-shorten-cta.md.description: drop plan from first part of cta below ascii art

2026-02-22-tab-focus-ring.md.description: implement 5-slot Tab focus ring: key defs, focusSlot state, key routing, tests, gradient, help

2026-02-22-update-shortcut-hints.md.description: D kill becomes K kill. i focus agent to i interactive mode. space actions becomes space shortcuts. hide P create PR and c checkout, remove R switch repo, keep the rest.

2026-02-22-wave-orchestration.md.description: implement wave orchestration: plan parser, instance fields, orchestrator state machine, validation gate, prompt builder, wiring, wave badge

2026-02-23-plan-state-machine.md.description: centralized FSM for plan lifecycle with flock serialization and agent sentinel files

2026-02-23-update-ascii-art.md.description: replace KLIQUE ascii art banner with KASMOS using same ANSI Shadow font

2026-02-24-add-episodic-memory.md.description: add episodic memory as a default skill when running init scaffolding command — shelved: none of the available memory plugins (episodic-memory, psychmem, hmem) are mature enough for dual-harness use yet

2026-02-24-clickup-import.md.description: add a feature for importing clickup tasks as plans using the official MCP server. this feature is optional and is only available when the clickup mcp server is detected. have it be an option at the bottom the plans list above history (+ import from clickup) or something like that. once the task details are downloaded, run the plan through superpowers brainstorming using a planning agent automatically to determine if it's ready for implementation or needs to be fleshed out.

2026-02-24-live-preview-terminal.md.description: replace capture-pane polling with live EmbeddedTerminal VT emulator in preview pane, unify with focus mode

2026-02-24-orphan-session-recovery.md.description: detect orphaned tmux sessions from plan agent crashes and let users reattach or kill them from the sidebar context menu

2026-02-24-parallel-fix-agents.md.description: currently if the reviewer rejects an implementation, a single coder agent is spawned to address everything. instead, the reviewer agent should automatically propose what fixes need to be made that clearly states what (if anything) can be fixed in parallel. kasmos should then automatically follow those steps. the maximum parallel should follow the same rules

2026-02-24-review-approval-gate.md.description: manual approval gate after automated review — two-popup flow for merge/PR before plan can be marked done

2026-02-24-sentry-integration.md.description: add sentry to the project for better debugging experience

2026-02-24-spring.md.description: integrate harmonica to add a spring load-in animation for the kasmos logo on launch — scales from small to big — and vertically center both the logo and the call to action line below it

2026-02-24-wizard-tui-redesign.md.description: replace huh-form init wizard with full-screen bubbletea TUI using Rosé Pine Moon aesthetic

2026-02-25-alt-v-not-working.md.description: alt+v doesnt passthrough in interactive mode (i need for my custom variants toggle keybind)

2026-02-25-contextual-status-bar.md.description: top status bar showing contextual info (wave progress, repo name, branch) based on focused/selected item

2026-02-25-enforce-cli-tools.md.description: automate cli-tools enforcement hooks installation during kas init for claude and opencode harnesses

2026-02-25-fix-planner-missing-waves.md.description: the planner agent should always use wave headers when launched via kasmos. a plan i just brainstormed had to go back to planner agent to add the headers

2026-02-25-improve-cli-tools.md.description: update cli-tools to be more strict and ensure rg is ALWAYS used over grep as well as other tools

2026-02-25-new-plan-tab-cycle.md.description: tab and shift tab should cycle through the 2 inputs not deselect once u reach end

2026-02-25-opencode-default-harness.md.description: opencode should be the default harness for each agent type, not claude

2026-02-25-prompt-via-cli.md.description: instead of waiting for the session to become ready to send the prompt text, supply it via --prompt (opencode) or -p (claude) when launching the agent directly

2026-02-25-scroll-overflow.md.description: manual scroll offset for list and sidebar overflow

2026-02-25-show-plan-name-for-topics.md.description: show the plan name you just entered when selecting a topic name because i have a bad memory and forget what plan i was adding

2026-02-25-simplify-plan-creation.md.description: add name and description for new plans to a single form popup. focuses on name by default - user can use tab navigation to the description input or use arrow down/up to navigate. hitting enter from either input creates the plan since description is optional

2026-02-25-solo-agent-mode.md.description: start solo agent context menu action — single coder in worktree with minimal prompt, no wave/review lifecycle

2026-02-26-bubblezone-mouse.md.description: bubblezone zone-per-element mouse hit detection, focus-mode escape via click, SGR mouse forwarding to PTY

2026-02-26-cleanup-superpowers-cmds.md.description: it seems some superpowers plans keep pushing claude to use grep (specifically writing-plans just now). these should be overriden to reference their modern counterparts

2026-02-26-details-tab.md.description: replace lazygit git tab with a read-only info tab

2026-02-26-detect-allow-perms.md.description: detect when opencode is asking for perms to Allow once, Allow always, Reject. show a popup dialog allowing the user to pick then propagate their change to the session. if they choose approve always (which should be default selection), you'll send right arrow -> enter -> enter. approve once is a single enter. reject is right arrow -> right arrow -> enter

2026-02-26-enter-not-reachable.md.description: can't reach the enter button via keyboard navigation in info tab. also move info tab to first position, agent second diff third

2026-02-26-kas-verify-loop.md.description: update reviewer instructions to loop reviewer <-> fixer until all tiers pass and ALL issues have been addressed, no matter the severity

2026-02-26-new-cli-command.md.description: kas new [title] [description] # new cli command (also runnable via kas n alias) to quickly create a new plan (no topic) with optional description via cli without having to launch tui

2026-02-26-no-plan-to-implement-prompt.m.description: you have to manually kill the planner agent before kasmos shows you the dialog to start implementation

2026-02-26-release-v1-0-0.md.description: create github release, update versioning in project and deploy to homebrew

2026-02-26-sentry-analysis.md.description: have an agent go through sentry backlog to pick out some areas for improvement/patching

2026-02-26-spawn-agent.md.description: restore 's' keybind for spawning an agent for manual work. make sure it appears clean in the instance list but doesn't require being attached to a plan and sits outside the normal lifecycle (but can still be killed and managed the same)

2026-02-26-stepthrough-worktrees.md.description: stepthrough git worktree and branch usage in both standard and solo agent workflows. ensure it's being used properly, there are no gaps or incorrect commands, and we're cleanly managing history between parallel plan implementations.

2026-02-26-tmux-session-browser.md.description: TUI overlay to browse, kill, and adopt orphaned tmux sessions

2026-02-26-validate-recent-merges.md.description: some work looks like it might've been lost or reverted, review the last few plans merged to determine what's been merged, what's been lost, and what can be recovered

2026-02-26-yes-keybind.md.description: add a y keybind to the instance list that sends yes to a session waiting for an answer to a yes/no question

2026-02-27-always-focus-sidebar.md.description: the purple focus highlight and keyboard should always cling to the sidebar outside of interactive or attach mode. hitting tab required me to navigate left to get back to sidebar when it should just kept my selection and shown the agent tab instead

2026-02-27-audit-log.md.description: log all actions (new 'coder' agent spawned, finished successfully/failed, etc etc). useful for debugging but also browsing history and tracking who did what and why automatically

2026-02-27-release-1-0-0-failures.md.description: check github to see the failure reasons and fix then redeploy v1.0.0

2026-02-27-simplify-new-plan.md.description: simplify creation of a new plan by only using one multiline input field labeled something like "describe what you want to work on..." as a label then use either a headless claude code call to sonnet-4-6 to derive a title or do it without ai if you can easily. descriptionw will be what the user entered

2026-02-27-tmux-session-summary.md.description: show a summary of active tmux sessions that would be shown if you did shift t keybind to browse the sessions, in addition to ones that are shown that aren't in there that are already, like, adopted or were the born with the same plan
